label: Info
text: SUBSCRIBE MY YOUTUBE CHANNEL! NEW APP: BOX SIMULATOR FOR BRAWL STARS HOW DO I GET MY PROBABYLITIES? How does it work?
view: android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout com.google.android.gms.ads.AdView android.widget.Button android.widget.Button android.widget.Button android.widget.Button android.widget.Button

label: HowDoesItWork
text: HOW DOES IT WORK? Everybody wants to know when he will get the next brawler. But this question can't be answered accurately because Supercell doesn't give us that information. We just get the probability of getting a brawler. This app takes your probability and simulates many box-openings. The count of opened boxes until you get your brawler is defined as a round. To be as accurate as possible this app is simulating 1000 rounds and calculates the average number of box-openings that were necessary to get the brawler. This method gives you an idea how long it can take to get your new brawler.
